basics.name: Ahmed Nasser
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: Software Engineer with a strong backend development background and a Bachelor's in Computer Science. Experienced in C++, Python, JavaScript, and TypeScript, with expertise in Node.js, Express.js, Flask, Docker, PostgreSQL, and CI/CD. Developed a Spyware Detector (96.3% accuracy) and a real-time chat application. Familiar with QEMU, SystemC/TLM modeling, Linux/RTOS, and microprocessor architectures. Passionate about building efficient, high-performance software.

education.institution: Faculty of Computers and Information, Fayoum University, Egypt
